title: For the second time this year, my Google Pixel XL will not recognise my password.
content: For the second time in 12 months my Pixel XL will not recognise my passcode. I really do not want to go through another reset and then have to download and set up all my apps. Why does this happen? and what can I do to get back into my phone?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
